snippet.title: ARC Indie 2024: Veredilia: The Sacred Forest Demo Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Well lads, it's finally here. Version 0.3.1 of Veredilia is out. The most long awaited and anticipated demo the game has ever seen. Now available at ARC Indie 2024.

New content includes:

- Two brand new stages (Tundra Plains and White Taiga), making for a grand total of six stages to play
- Redesigned enemies
- New enemies
- Brand new boss fight for the Underground area, making for a total of two boss fights
- New moves, combos and abilities for the playable characters, making more of an emphasis on building momentum
- Gameplay improvements and bug fixes
- New and improved sprites
- New powerups
- Improved difficulty selection
- The entire first chapter of the story included in full with fully voice acted cutscenes
- And much more!

Music used in trailer: White Zombie - More Human Than Human
As seen in ARC Indie Current Direct: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jLCOCcsekhA&ab_channel=H.T.I 

Download the game here:
ARC Indie Page: https://www.hedgehogtechnicalinstitute.com/arcINDIE-24/
HTI Arc Indie Forum: https://www.hedgehogtechnicalinstitute.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=137
Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/veredilia-game/448407
Itch.io: https://giga6152.itch.io/veredilia-the-sacred-forest
